Lots of awareness on campus and a ton of accountability. However, this leads to a heightened awareness of the nature of our culture of rape, so you can't ignore how bad things are on average. This is not a negative. There is a campus security force but due to the nature of a security apparatus it is hard to trust them with much.
Nope.
You can make up whatever you want or you can join a club. If you like to dance, it is pretty great, we got a dance collective.

Self motivated individuals. The people who don't really fit at other schools. The individuals who are working towards establishing their sense of identity among equals. Those who don't like being reduced to a grade or a number.
There is a massive forest behind the campus and a beach front.
Very good value for the cost. Evergreen is very cheap for a state school.
Dance, go to the woods or the beach, go to a show, hang out with friends, or go for a bike ride. It's a very active place for active people.
Great student run cafe, main food service is awful.
Never lived there, heard it was OK.
Very rigorous but not obscenely difficult. The rigor depends on you.
Make sure you know that you want to go here, this school is not for everyone. It is great for people who are willing to take chances as well as people who are willing to find out new things.
It is a fantastic liberal arts college. It has great options for self motivated individuals. It is a great place for finding out what you want to do in life.

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Anonymous 03/17/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 10 out of 11 people found this review useful. 2 of 32 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Evergreen is very accepting to any person wanting to pursue their dreams. No matter what race, religion, or gender you are, no one here on campus is judgmental. This college offers many classes in the arts, teaching, and sciences, so anyone wanting to pursue their career in these fields should definitely check out Evergreen. Tips for prospective students Anyone contemplating on attending this college is definitely recommended. The memories, friends, and education you receive is well worth it. Bang for the buck This college is totally worth your time and your money. With the diverse and cultural atmosphere and amazing courses to take, what you learn here at Evergreen will definitely last a lifetime. Am enjoying being here
